body:
## Release Notes

- Add CODEOWNERS and settings.yml files. @iphydf (#19)
- Migrate java dependencies to rules_jvm_external. @iphydf (#18)
- Mark jvm-macros tests as small. @iphydf (#17)
- Remove glob patterns that don't match anything. @iphydf (#16)
- Upgrade dependencies to their latest version. @iphydf (#15)
- Enable .travis.yml check and use non-markdown license. @iphydf (#14)
- Remove unused dependency on scalactic. @iphydf (#13)
- Remove direct scalatest dependency. @iphydf (#12)
- Update to next version of sbt-plugins. @iphydf (#11)
- Add a bazel test that ensures all our projects are GPL-3.0. @iphydf (#10)
- Relicense under GPLv3. @iphydf (#9)
- Avoid clashes with "build" directories on case-insensitive file systems. @iphydf (#8)
- Update to new sbt-plugins version, removing protobuf dependency. @iphydf (#7)
- Update protobuf version requirement. @iphydf (#6)
- Update toktok sbt plugins version to 0.1.3. @iphydf (#5)
- Use official markdown license for AGPLv3. @iphydf (#4)
- Don't use `git.depth=1` anymore. @iphydf (#3)
- Only fetch 1 revision from git during Travis builds. @iphydf (#2)
- Implement readme dependency list update plugin. @iphydf (#1)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Don't try to resolve now-sunset bintray repositories @robinlinden (#23)
- Set up sbt CI using GitHub Actions @robinlinden (#24)
- Use toktok-stack 0.0.23 for cirrus builds. @iphydf (#22)
- Remove travis; add cirrus ci. @iphydf (#21)
